meanings.sent1: The soldiers prepared for the preinvasion briefing.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the period before an invasion.
meanings.sent1: The preinvasion intelligence gathering was meticulous.
meanings.sent2: The preinvasion reconnaissance provided valuable information.
meanings.sent3: The preinvasion planning session was filled with anticipation.
meanings.sent4: The preinvasion silence was eerie in the deserted town.
meanings.sent5: The preinvasion atmosphere was charged with anticipation.
